info.name: Cron Job Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Cron Job Backend with all endpoints and edge cases

request.description: Login with valid username and password to get access and refresh tokens
Edge case: Login without username - should return 400 error
Edge case: Login without password - should return 400 error
Edge case: Login with incorrect password - should return 401 error
Edge case: Login with non-existent username - should return 401 error
Register a new user (Admin only). Admin must be authenticated.
Edge case: Register without username - should return 400 error
Edge case: Register with already existing username - should return 409 error
Edge case: Register with already existing email - should return 409 error
Edge case: Register with username less than 3 characters - should return 400 error
Edge case: Register with password less than 6 characters - should return 400 error
Edge case: Register with invalid role - should return 400 error. Valid roles: admin, user, viewer
Edge case: Non-admin user trying to register - should return 403 error
Refresh the access token using a valid refresh token
Edge case: Try to refresh with invalid token - should return 401 error
Get the current authenticated user's information
Edge case: Get current user without authentication - should return 401 error
List all users - Admin only endpoint
Edge case: Non-admin trying to list all users - should return 403 error

item.name: Get User by ID - Own Profile

request.description: Get user profile by ID - Users can view their own profile

item.name: Get User by ID - Another User Profile

request.description: Edge case: Non-admin trying to view another user's profile - should return 403 error

item.name: Get User by ID - Non-existent User

request.description: Edge case: Get a non-existent user - should return 404 error
Update user's own profile - can update email and password
Edge case: Non-admin trying to update another user's profile - should return 403 error

item.name: Update User - Admin Updating Another User

request.description: Admin updating another user's role and active status
Edge case: Update with already existing email - should return 409 error
Edge case: Update with password less than 6 characters - should return 400 error
Delete a user - Admin only endpoint
Edge case: Admin trying to delete their own account - should return 400 error
Edge case: Non-admin trying to delete user - should return 403 error

item.name: Jobs Management
item.description: Job creation, management, and execution endpoints

request.description: Create a new job with webhook URL target. Can specify metadata and email notifications.
Create a job that triggers GitHub Actions workflow
Edge case: Create job without name - should return 400 error
Edge case: Create job without cron_expression - should return 400 error
Edge case: Create job with invalid cron expression - should return 400 error
Edge case: Create job with duplicate name - should return 400 error

item.name: Create Job - No Target (Missing URL & GitHub)

request.description: Edge case: Create job without target URL or GitHub config - should return 400 error
Edge case: Viewer role trying to create job - should return 403 error
Edge case: Create job without authentication - should return 401 error
List all jobs - All authenticated users can view jobs
Edge case: List jobs without authentication - should return 401 error
Get details of a specific job by ID
Edge case: Get non-existent job - should return 404 error
Update job details - Owner or Admin can update
Edge case: Update job with invalid cron expression - should return 400 error
Edge case: Update job with already existing name - should return 400 error
Edge case: Remove all targets from job - should return 400 error (job must have at least one target)
Edge case: Non-owner user trying to update another user's job - should return 403 error
Edge case: Update non-existent job - should return 404 error
Delete a job - Owner or Admin can delete
Edge case: Non-owner user trying to delete another user's job - should return 403 error
Edge case: Delete non-existent job - should return 404 error
Get execution history for a job with limit parameter

item.name: Get Job Executions - Filter by Status

request.description: Get job executions filtered by status (success, failed, running)

item.name: Get Job Executions - Filter by Type

request.description: Get job executions filtered by trigger type (scheduled, manual)
Edge case: Get executions for non-existent job - should return 404 error
Get detailed information about a specific job execution
Edge case: Get details of non-existent execution - should return 404 error
Get execution statistics for a job including success rate and average duration
Edge case: Get stats for non-existent job - should return 404 error

item.description: Health check and system status endpoints
